name: EduMatrix: Unveiling the Artistry of Udemy's Learning Realm
desc: A Power BI dashboard analyzing Udemy course data from 2011 to 2017, emphasizing key market trends.

name: CHRISTMAS RETAIL SALES INSIGHTS
desc: Analysis of Market trends and Sales during the Christmas and other special events over the years from 2018 till 2023. The Dashboard is build using Excel and Power BI.

name: YouTube Stardom Explorer - Data-Driven Insights
desc: An performance report of Top 1000 Youtubers in the month of November 2023 with respect to the Subscribers, Video Views and so on built with Power BI.
